class_notes:
(Same as LING 446W 1 and QTM 446W 1)


This is an online course open to students on campus and students who are unable to return to campus. There are some additional seats reserved for remote students who are unable to return to campus; these students should request enrollment through the following form: https://tinyurl.com/OUEremoteform.
course_description: An interdisciplinary exploration of digital tools for analyzing and visualizing data in the humanities and social sciences.
